name: SoftSide Adventure of the Month 20: Danger Is My Business
overview: Danger is by Business is the twentieth and final in a series of monthly text adventures for multiple systems. You are Sarasota Sam, Secret Agent. The American Ambassador to India's daughter has been kidnapped into the wild jungles of the subcontinent. You must brave the dangers of the jungle, while harassing and avoiding the numerous natives within the jungle. Eventually you come across the kidnappers in their tent with the kidnapped woman. The player must disarm the kidnappers, and bring the woman to the safety of the American embassy. All commands are via 2-word VERB NOUN entries, and game play contains several object puzzles. There is no save and restore feature.
